cause.description:
A sad day has dawned for lads globally. The emergence of the Lulu lads and their HQ of zari has led to the demise of a lads hotspot, Clans.
This coupled with the current rate of inflation means that many lads are finding themselves without the essential components which drive a Mercato Lad and allows them to get the five illustrious components.
1. To make sure all lads have a pint in their hand at all times
2. To rescue major Munns from the Zari bathroom
3. To buy Skank a toothpick for last mondays porridge still in his teeth
cause.mission: make sure all lads worldwide have all components available to them.
cause.name: S.L.I.P - Save Lads In Poverty
